Description: back pay award in unfair labor practices case
NAICS Translation: 621111: Offices of Physicians (except Mental Health Specialists)
Info Source: Extracted from an NLRB dataset covering 1999-2011 downloaded at https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/nlrb-cats-final-c-case-data-bulk-19990101-20110930-in-xml

Company: Logan Laboratories Inc. and Tampa Pain Relief Centers Inc.
Description: Logan Laboratories Inc., a reference laboratory in Tampa, Florida; Tampa Pain Relief Centers Inc., a pain clinic also based in Tampa Florida; and two of their former executives agreed to pay a total of $41 million to resolve alleged violations of the False Claims Act for billing Medicare, Medicaid, TRICARE, and other federal health care programs for medically unnecessary urine drug testing.

Company: Logan Laboratories Inc. and Tampa Pain Relief Centers Inc.
Description: Logan Laboratories and Tampa Pain Relief Centers agreed to pay more than $500,000 to a group of states to resolve allegations that they billed for unnecessary tests.

NAICS Translation: 621493: Freestanding Ambulatory Surgical and Emergency Centers
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
